name: Guano Gladiators
description: The party game nobody asked for, but everybody needs. Guano Gladiators is a local multiplayer competitive brawler for 2-4 players! Assume the role of adorable creatures and attempt to poop on your friends to find out who reigns aerial excrement superiority.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2.6 GHz) / AMD Athlon 64 X2 (2.6 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 2900 XT (512 MB) / GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Most fun with 4 Gamepads and USB hub
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
